column4: hi. I have an intel integrated graphics card and an nvidia card. Is it possible to use both? I would prefer to use whatever card has better linux support.
NIVDIA and INTEl have good support, the Nividia (Im using one now) will be supported and prob better
no need to, it will offer to install the driver and it will install an offical cp for you
Basicly Ubuntu will ask you if you want it to donwload and install it all for you, you say yes and enter password and you is dun

you do not need to install it, Ubuntu will do it for you mainly, no probs like there where a few years ago, Im using one now
if you have already installed 10.10 just goto system - prefrences - apperance and click on advanced, then click on medium and go from there
